p:
Similarly, COVA1-18 and COVA2-15 were identified from convalescent patients by using SARS-CoV-2 S protein as antigen. Both NMAbs targeted the RBD of SARS-CoV-2 S protein.
40 These mAbs showed neutralization activity against the pseudovirus of SARS-CoV-2 with an IC 50 value of 8 ng/ml and potently inhibited live SARS-CoV-2 infection with IC 50 values of 7 and 9 ng/ml, respectively.
